item.title: Deep Learning Methods for Quotable Text
item.author: Anirudh Ganesh
item.description:
Abstract

The goal of this study is to find out what makes a given sentence more memorable and quotable than others. Traditional methods of linguistic analysis have been done historically and theyâ€™ve had limited sucess. The aim of this study is to find out whether a machine learning solely on its own, is able to learn more effectively.
